ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Deal_Type__c, "Change Order"), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Sync_to_Renewal__c)), TEXT(Sync_to_Renewal__c) = "" ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Lost") ), NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sync to Renewal selection is required for all products on Change Order opportunities before closing. Please select "Yes" or "No" for each product to indicate whether it should continue to the renewal opportunity.
